description: This file provides utility functions for making API requests (GET and POST) to a backend server. It sets a base URL from environment variables or defaults to localhost and defines helper functions that perform fetch calls with appropriate options, handle errors, and parse JSON responses.

methods.name: apiGet(endpoint, opts = {})
methods.description: Asynchronously performs a GET request to a specified endpoint, including credentials, and returns the parsed JSON response. Throws an error if the request is unsuccessful.

methods.name: apiPost(endpoint, body, opts = {})
methods.description: Asynchronously performs a POST request to a specified endpoint with a JSON-encoded body, including credentials and additional options, returning the parsed JSON response. Throws an error if the request fails.
